sentence: The nightlife was far from crazy spring break but that is not what we were looking for
Check out the little shops under the hotel in the tunnel leading to the casino for snacks and drinks
The other thing that we hoped for was a casino
The one downside was the lack of nightlife
We found eating inside at Aqua better ambiance as the decent lounge singer provided some mood music outside does not have same ambiance

Now it is their goal to open up the largest casino on the strip but it is at a halt because of the issues with money and the opening of the other hotels as they will all be sharing the new casino once everything gets resolved
We had taken a cab over 30 USD one day for the 4 of us to Atlantis for a few hours to check out the casino and shops
The Melia Hotel needs a Casino
Between the beach pools boos food and entertainment I had say it is worth it
There was a very loud DJ playing and hundreds of college students at the lobby bar which was fine it was late on a Saturday but we were to soon find out this was to be the norm everywhere
They had a DJ at the pool during the day
We also took the shuttle from our hotel to the Grand Hyat casino

Overall if you only like to drink and get drunk this is a good place otherwise if you want great entertainment good food and fun activities And a nice looking clean with great service hotel this is not the place for you
Suggest maybe some more niht entertaining and continue the Reno ’s
Nightly entertainment was n’t very entertaining
Also every evening there was a DJ almost every night with people dancing lively crowd or just enjoying the music
We come back because we are treated like family unlike the bahamar where we were treated like cattle

There was fantastic music from the OGrile in the mornings but from about midday it became a really uncomfortable cacophony speakers throughout the gardens OGrile Bar then also DJ and the daily entertainment all at the same time and all playing great but different music not enjoyable
Rooms need updating for sureLive entertainment was nice
It also has free shuttle to other nearby resorts like BahaMar SLS Sandals etc
Melia is a good choice if you enjoy cruise ships plenty of mediocre food and cheesy entertainment
We walked to Baha Mar nightly for entertainment
It is a excellent location 12 minute trip from the airport safe and right beside the new Las Vegas style Baha Mar behemoth which provides you some nightly entertainment benefits
The casino is at the Baha Mar Resort which is a short scenic walk along the beach
have one really nice dinner at bahamar
Lil Mo had the beach rocking with her nice moves and great entertainment
A group of 25 girls came on vacation we had the BEST time and little Mo took care of us on the beach the whole time sweet entertaining and a great dancer
The beach is beautiful and the boardwalk to the other resorts and Casino were just beautiful at night
it is also a walk away from Baha Mar which has a bunch of nightlife options
Shanishka LaFrance Alphrize Doren Jerdavinique Brithnie at Market Place they were very hospitable but they are also some of the best singers I have heard
